column5: I have an older shorter 3/4" treaded seat post 11" tall came of my 91 mirrocraft...Im looking for an adapter piece so I can use my bicclye seat to operate foot controled bow mount..looking for an adjustable post 22" +..Lebaron, CTC and Bass Pro don't have older version like mine.... the 3/4 treaded shank they carry is much longer than mine at the base.....Besides Online, Bass pro  where else can i find right seat post??
The only other place that comes to mind is West Marine..
